articles.title: SA Player Tests Positive for COVID-19 Ahead of England Series - The Quint
articles.description: The entire England team has returned negative after being tested on their arrival in Cape Town. The visitors will play their practice match in Newlands on Saturday.
articles.content:
On Friday, the countrys cricket board (CSA) said that one more player has tested positive after a second mandatory Covid-19 test on Thursday.

articles.title: Ex-Clippers forward Montrezl Harrell headed to Lakers on 2-year deal, agent says - ESPN India
articles.description: The LA Clippers are losing a key contributor as Sixth Man of the Year Montrezl Harrell agreed to sign a two-year deal with the Los Angeles Lakers on Friday, agent Rich Paul of Klutch Sports told ESPN.
articles.content:
The Los Angeles Lakers have added the reigning Sixth Man of the Year to their upcoming title defense by agreeing to terms Friday with free-agent big man Montrezl Harrell.
